title: Tasco Essentials 10x50 WA, Zip Focus Binocular
description: Third in line to food and shelter, a quality pair of binoculars is one of life's necessities. Enter the Tasco Essentials 10x50 zip-focus binocular, a bright, high-power workhorse that offers a great wide-angle performance. Essentials porro-prism binoculars are ideal for a variety of activities, from remote camping trips to Sunday drives. The binocular includes fully multicoated lenses that optimize clarity and brightness, along with a rugged, weather-resistant housing coated with rubber armor.  The Essentials line of roof-prism binoculars are tough, weather resistant and, most importantly, affordable. So whether you’re big-game hunting or stopping off to see the world’s largest prairie dog colony, there’s an Essentials binocular just right for the occasion.SpecificationsMagnification: 10xObjective lens: 50mmSize class: StandardFocus system: ZipPrism system: PorroLens coating: FullyField of view: 367 feet @ 1,000 yardsExit pupil: 5mmEyecups: Fold downWaterproof/fogproof: NoTripod adaptable: YesWeight: 26.4 ounces
